name: A Tree On Mars
description:
A Tree On Mars

Words from the creator :

Hi !
This is my first full game ever made in solo. I made it for the Indie Game Maker Contest in one month during the 2015 summer.
I'm sorry for the long loading screens between levels. Hope you will enjoy the game.
David

Pitch :

A Tree On Mars is a 20-30mn game about a little flying robot growing a tree on the red planet. Each time you finish a level the Tree will grow.

Gameplay :

A Tree On Mars has a 2D gameplay in a 3D world. I tried to make a game without any text or tutorials, by making a level design that teaches the player the game mechanics. Your character is a little flying robot that can move up/down and right/left. You can push physical objects that are used to solve puzzles. You must avoid obstacles like lasers are sand bursts, play with elevators and push a lot of rocks. You have to explore the levels and at each level end, you unlock water for the Tree and a new level. It allowed me to create the game without knowing the exact number of levels I had to design.
